name: Vince the Viking
blurb: Pilot Vince through waves of familiar enemies!
description: 3rd Year BSc Computer Science project for the Multimedia module. The game was released incompleted, only taking the player through 2 complete stages.

name: Give Me Your Eyes!
blurb: Purple dude looses his eyes to an alien!
description: 1st Year BSc Computer Science projuect for the Intro to Multimedia module. Inspiration taken from Don Hertzfeldt's Rejected cartoons

name: Blood Soaked Insignificance
description: 2nd year Moving Image Arts A-Level project. Inspiration from Tarantino. An incomplete film.

name: Mans Tongues Arms Flower
blurb: A man shows off his tongues' arms' flower!
description: Hand drawn, frame by frame. Collated with Flash.

name: The Evil Demon
blurb: An animation influenced by René Descartes' meditation: The Evil Demon/Genius
description: 1st year Moving Image Arts A-level project. Influenced by René Descartes' meditation: The Evil Demon/Genius. Music by Pink Floyd
